mapper.select: select o.ocode, o.ocount, decode (o.ostate, 1, '배송전', 2, '배송시작', 3, '구매확정') as omethod , o.odate, l.pname as oshipcode, o.ocharge, nvl(b.bnum, 0) as oaddress from orderdb o join listdb l on (o.pcode = l.pcode) left outer join userdb u on (o.ucode = u.ucode) left outer join boarddb b on (u.ucode = b.bcode and o.pcode = b.pcode and b.btype=2) where (odate between add_months(sysdate, -(#{param2}+3)) and add_months(sysdate, -(#{param2}))) and u.userid = #{param1}
